title: Beef and pepper tacos
ingredients: ['500g beef mince', '1 small green chilli pepper, seeded and minced', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 onion, halved and sliced', '2 green peppers, sliced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '8 small or 4 large soft tortillas', 'soured cream, to taste', 'guacamole, to taste']
